title: I  put rp points onto my brothers account instead of mine :C
body:
Should I give up or is there a way I can get them transferred I also already spent them. We both use the same computer and both use the same password so I Didn't realize when I spent them what account they would be on :C

So do I give up or is there something I can do

replies.body:
Hey deadturtle,

For accidental purchases of RP we only make exceptions for transferring RP between accounts if the requester **owns both accounts**. You can [contact support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what they can do for you but they are likely to stick to this policy.
It's ok he just got me some rp so everything worked out but I guess we should change the passwords
Have you considered changing passwords? I mean, if one account is compromised then *both* your accounts are compromised.
